name: @niivue/niimath

scripts.prebuild: npm run makeTiny && npm run parseHelpText && npm run makeWasm && node scripts/pre-build.js -i src/niimath.js -o src/niimath.js
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish --access public

author: NiiVue developers
description: A javascript library to easily use the WASM build of Chris Rorden's niimath command line program written in C
